MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy(class System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter exporter, class System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext context) cil managed
Sub ExportPolicy (exporter As MetadataExporter, context As PolicyConversionContext) Implements IPolicyExportExtension.ExportPolicy

span.span: The that you can use to modify the exporting process.

param.name: context
param.span: 您可以用於插入自訂原則判斷提示的 。

span.span: The that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.

summary.span: 匯出關於繫結的自訂原則判斷提示。

span.span: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將繫結相關陳述式寫入至特定合約所公開的 WSDL 資訊，並會由 WCF 用戶端進行通訊的繫結堆疊中的這個自訂繫結項目存在。This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by WCF to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack. 這個方法採用兩個參數： 和 物件。This method takes two parameters: the and objects. 您可以使用 、 和 方法，取得已經在各種範圍匯出的原則判斷提示的集合。Use the , , and methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes. 接著使用這個方法將您自己的原則判斷提示新增至適當的集合中。Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection. 屬性會公開正在匯出的端點的 。The property exposes the for the endpoint that is being exported. 這可讓這個方法正確限定其匯出原則判斷提示的範圍。This enables this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions. 例如，程式碼中的安全性屬性可能會將行為新增至 ，指出應在何處新增安全性原則判斷提示。For example, security attributes in code can add behaviors to the that indicate where security policy assertions should be added. 在自訂原則判斷提示附加至 WSDL 資訊之後，用戶端就可以實作 介面來偵測及匯入自訂繫結判斷提示。Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an interface.
